text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ami icharaa'ilara santanasakalara pratisrauti laichilo ye, tomaloke allahara bahirae ana karao ibadata nakaraiba, pitr-matr, atmiya-sbajana, etima arau daraidrara saite sadaya sadbyarahara karaiba arau manuhara lagata uttama byarahara karaiba arau chalata pratistha karaiba arau yakata pradana karaiba, tara pichata tomalokara kichu sankhyaka lokara bahirae sakalorae arajna karai mukha ghuraa'i laichila
